# ArbMe

> Decentralized arbitrage protocol on Base. $ARBME is an ERC20 hub token that pairs with other tokens to create arbitrage routes across DEXs.

## What ArbMe Does

ArbMe connects token economies through shared liquidity pools. The $ARBME token sits between trading pairs — when prices diverge across DEXs, arbitrageurs route through ARBME pools to capture the difference. LPers provide liquidity and earn fees from this cross-traffic.

- Permissionless pool creation across Uniswap V2, V3, V4, and Balancer V3
- Hub routing: 5 connected tokens = 10 routes. The mesh compounds with every new connection.
- Two-sided market: LPers earn fees, arbers profit from price discrepancies
- Built on Base (low gas, ~$0.01 per transaction)

## Key URLs

- Landing page: https://arbme.epicdylan.com
- App (pools, positions, trading): https://arbme.epicdylan.com/app
- How It Works: https://arbme.epicdylan.com/#how
- API — Pool data: https://arbme.epicdylan.com/api/pools

- Token: $ARBME

- Chain: Base (8453)
- DexScreener: https://dexscreener.com/base/0x6afd39b7114a0892d10ffaae2eefcc16777dd376273c25d9d4f3a1a065131b83
- BaseScan: https://basescan.org/token/0xC647421C5Dc78D1c3960faA7A33f9aEFDF4B7B07
